title: 澳洲駐香港及澳門總領事館對香港發出旅遊警示

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/134633226604701/posts/2128388810562456?s=786085991&sfns=mo

We’ve updated our smartraveller.gov.au advice for 🇭🇰 #HongKong:

Demonstrations are continuing in parts of Hong Kong. Confrontations have occurred between police and protesters, mainly on the weekends and in the evening. Expect road closures and public transport disruptions. Separately, attacks by reportedly criminally-linked individuals targeted commuters in the New Territories. Avoid demonstrations, monitor local media and follow the advice of local authorities. See Safety and security We have not changed our travel advice level - exercise normal safety precautions. #beinformed #beprepared

https://smartraveller.gov.au/Countries/asia/north/Pages/hong_kong.aspx

replies.msg: 做下標題黨得唔得先

Large-scale demonstrations, and police action in response, have been ongoing on Hong Kong Island, in Kowloon and various suburbs in the New Territories. These have led to road closures and disruption to public transport, MTR stations and public spaces. Further demonstrations are expected. Separately, attacks by reportedly criminally-linked individuals have targeted commuters in the New Territories. Avoid large public gatherings, monitor local media and follow the advice of local authorities. See Safety and security

翻譯

Demonstrations are continuing in parts of Hong Kong. Confrontations have occurred between police and protesters, mainly on the weekends and in the evening. Expect road closures and public transport disruptions. Separately, attacks by reportedly criminally-linked individuals targeted commuters in the New Territories. Avoid demonstrations, monitor local media and follow the advice of local authorities. See Safety and security We have not changed our travel advice level - exercise normal safety precautions. #beinformed #beprepared

在香港部分地區持續有示威。 警方與示威者之間發生了衝突，主要是在周末及晚上。 預計會封閉道路和影響公共交通。 另外，有報道指與犯罪有關的團體襲擊了新界的公共交通乘客。 避免有示威的地方，關注當地媒體，並遵循當地政府的建議。 請參閱安全及保障（另一網頁）。我們沒有改變我們的旅行建議級別 - 採取正常的安全預防措施。

雖然有提下都好過冇，但你乜都唔覺，遊客隨時被當外國勢力指揮官俾人打到入廠。
陸續有嚟
